w4160.engine.graphics

Class Transformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • w4160.engine.graphics.Transformation

  • public class Transformation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to calculate the several matrices needed to transform all objects in a scene to the display window.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Transformation() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.joml.Matrix4f getModelMatrix(GameItem gameItem)
      Returns the Model Matrix which transforms model space to world space by applying the transformation (translation, rotation, scale) parameters of the given GameItem.
      org.joml.Matrix4f getModelViewMatrix(GameItem gameItem, org.joml.Matrix4f viewMatrix) 
      org.joml.Matrix4f getProjectionMatrix(float fov, float width, float height, float zNear, float zFar)
      Calculates the Projection Matrix which transforms vectors in camera space to homogeneous space.
      org.joml.Matrix4f getViewMatrix(Camera camera)
      Returns a View Matrix which transforms vertices from world space to camera space.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Transformation

        public Transformation()

    • Method Detail

      • getProjectionMatrix

        public final org.joml.Matrix4f getProjectionMatrix(float fov,
                                                   float width,
                                                   float height,
                                                   float zNear,
                                                   float zFar)
        Calculates the Projection Matrix which transforms vectors in camera space to homogeneous space.
        Parameters:
        fov - The vertical field of view in radians
        width - The width of my window
        height - The height of my window
        zNear - Near clipping plane
        zFar - Far clipping plane
        Returns:
        The Projection Matrix

      • getViewMatrix

        public org.joml.Matrix4f getViewMatrix(Camera camera)
        Returns a View Matrix which transforms vertices from world space to camera space. The information about the camera is stored in the input Camera instance.
        Parameters:
        camera - The camera contains information about the camera space
        Returns:
        The View Matrix
        See Also:
        Camera

      • getModelMatrix

        public org.joml.Matrix4f getModelMatrix(GameItem gameItem)
        Returns the Model Matrix which transforms model space to world space by applying the transformation (translation, rotation, scale) parameters of the given GameItem.

        Note: The returned ModelMatrix is to transform the specific GameItem.

        Parameters:
        gameItem - The object to generate the model matrix from
        Returns:
        The Model Matrix
        See Also:
        GameItem

      • getModelViewMatrix

        public org.joml.Matrix4f getModelViewMatrix(GameItem gameItem,
                                            org.joml.Matrix4f viewMatrix)
